TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICTPFactory

Docs.summary: Used to create a custom task pane.

remarks.para: Note: You can create custom task panes in any language that supports COM and allows you to create dynamic-linked library (DLL) files. For example, Microsoft Visual Basic® 6.0, Microsoft Visual Basic .NET, Microsoft Visual C++®, Microsoft Visual C++ .NET, and Microsoft Visual C#®. However, Microsoft Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) does not support creating custom task panes.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomTaskPane CreateCTP (string CTPAxID, string CTPTitle, object CTPParentWindow);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Core.CustomTaskPane CreateCTP([in]string CTPAxID, [in]string CTPTitle, [in]object CTPParentWindow) runtime managed
Public Function CreateCTP (CTPAxID As String, CTPTitle As String, Optional CTPParentWindow As Object) As CustomTaskPane

Docs.param: The CLSID or ProgID of a Microsoft ActiveX® object.
The title for the task pane.
The window that hosts the task pane. If not present, the parent of the task pane is the ActiveWindow property of the host application.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of a custom task pane.
